ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts [Note: It’s not artichoke season right now so Save this recipe for the spring months like April and May, if you do want to use fresh and seasonal artichokes]
1 c. chicken stock or canned low-sodium broth
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
1/2 c. freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese
